main event: Crew members of an RB-66 A/C reported a bright luminous object resembling an F-86 aircraft at Spangdahlem AFB on April 22, 1959.
interesting points: The luminous object was described as being approximately seventy-two feet in diameter., The object appeared about forty-five degrees below the aircraft's position., It emitted a white luminous glow followed by a black smoke contrail., The object was sighted while the aircraft was at thirty-six thousand feet, and it maintained a straight and level flight path., All reporting personnel were considered reliable and qualified.
sighted object: a bright luminous object resembling an F-86 aircraft
witness description: captains and lieutenants from the 42nd Tactical Fighter Squadron
